Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 2/7/1970 to a 3-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
Traded from Chicago (A) to St. Louis on 2/13/1970 (Going to STL: P R. Sadecki. Going to CHW: 1B J. Staton)...
Traded from St. Louis to Chicago (N) on 5/12/1975 (Going to STL: P B. Edgerton, 3B J. Williams. Going to CHC: P R. Jarvis, P R. Sadecki)...
Won World Series with Chicago (N) in 1975...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 2/12/1977 to a 2-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
